Q_DESC:
Create a class called circle with one data member named radius(int). Include 4 functions in the class namely setRadius(), getRadius(), calculateArea() and calculate Perimeter().refer class template for further details on functions.
In the main function, create an object of circle class and invoke the 4 methods
Input :-    
Enter radius;
Output:-
Line1:-  radius of circle 
Line 2:- area of circle
Line 3:- perimeter of circle.
